name: Burger Bandits 2022
description:
Description:
In Burger Bandits you play as a raccoon that has snuck his way into a
restaurant and is attempting to steal food. The only problem is that The
employees are still cleaning up. Lucky for you there are holes in the
walls that you can use to better traverse the area. Do your best to
collect as much food as possible before leaving through the door you
entered.

Controls:
A & D - Move horizontally
W or Space - Jump
S - Drop through platform
E - Interact

Credits:
Andrew K. - Level Design
Benjamin M. - Animation
Gavin C. - Primary Programmer & UI
Hanna B. - Sound Design
Luke D. - Level Art
